Purpose: Container for all the table content
Notes: Always included as it is the main container element

Purpose: Provides a title or summary for the table
Notes: Must be the first child of &lt table >

Purpose: Groups header rows at the top of the table

Notes: Used within &lt thead >, &lt tbody >, and &lt tfoot >

Purpose: Defines a header cell (column or row header)
Notes: Use scope=’col’ for column headers and scope=’row’ for row headers
Must be used inside a &lt tr >

Purpose: Attribute that tells screen readers the direction of a header
Notes: Possible values are row, col, rowgroup, colgroup

Purpose: Associates a data cell with one or more headers
Notes: Uses id from a &lt th > element and used inside a &lt td > element

Purpose: Spans a cell across multiple columns or rows
Notes: This can complicate screen reader navigation so try to avoid overusing cells that span multiple columns or rows
